items.sentence: When the boss found out how Tom had treated Mary, he fired him.
I was stuck in a traffic jam for thirty minutes this afternoon.
I would've gone to Australia with you if my parents had let me.
I think Tom is able to play the harmonica as well as Mary does.
You can't achieve the impossible without attempting the absurd.
You can't separate the milk from the coffee once you put it in.
I think you should walk your dog at least thirty minutes a day.
I hope that Tom isn't going to be the one who does the driving.
The book that I was looking for was at the bottom of the stack.
Is it true that private schools are better than public schools?
